channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
Player owned shops?
i wounder if this is possible... like when they do this you can right click on a person and click on "use shop" or something, also text above there head like in other online games?
would add an item like a potato... "shop potato" ((lol)) and add a button on it "set up shop" and an interface comes up like the bank interface and you type in text and it comes up permently.
like you say "Selling crap" and in shop mode that will be above your head untill you close the interface
i wounder if this is possible
/317/ pi
